summary: Website draft for CAFE 37 (hangout cafe), including business hours and header branding.

existing_features.title: Update the site branding title to show the main title text as "CAFE 37" and the tagline/subtitle text as "The ultimate hangout cafe" wherever the café name/tagline is displayed (e.g., Home hero, header/footer brand block, share text, and any tagline component).

Update the displayed business hours to match the provided weekly schedule: Friday–Sunday 12 pm–12 am; Monday–Thursday 1 pm–12 am. Ensure this schedule is shown on the Contact page and anywhere else the site currently displays hours/closing time (e.g., footer and Home hero “Closes at” line).

Update site-level HTML metadata title/description (frontend/index.html) to reflect the updated branding "CAFE 37" and the new tagline "The ultimate hangout cafe" (user-facing SEO strings should be consistent with the updated title/tagline).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update displayed business hours to the provided schedule (Fri–Sun 12pm–12am; Mon–Thu 1pm–12am).
Update site title/hero text to: "CAFE 37" and subtitle/tagline: "The ultimate hangout cafe".
